#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    long long int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        long long n;
        cin>>n;
 
        signed long long d[n][3];
        memset(d,0,sizeof(d));
        for (long long i = 0; i<n; i++)
        {
            cin>>d[i][0]>>d[i][1]>>d[i][2];
        }
        if (n>1)
        {
            for (long long i = n-2; i>=0; i--)
            {
                d[i][0] =d[i][0] + min(d[i+1][1],d[i+1][2]);
                d[i][1] =d[i][1] + min(d[i+1][0],d[i+1][2]);
                d[i][2] =d[i][2] + min(d[i+1][0],d[i+1][1]);
            }
        }
        long long ans = d[0][0];
        ans = min(ans,d[0][1]);
        ans = min(ans,d[0][2]);
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
 
    return 0;
}
